TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressIldasmAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressIldasmAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressIldasmAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Impede que o Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler) desmonte um assembly.

span.span: Prevents the Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler) from disassembling an assembly.

summary.span: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Aplicar a de atributo para um assembly ou módulo para impedir que o assembly ou módulo que está sendo desmontado usando o [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md).Apply the attribute to an assembly or module to prevent the assembly or module from being disassembled using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). Esse atributo não impede que um assembly seja exibido usando reflexão.This attribute does not prevent an assembly from being viewed using reflection. Observe que não bloqueia o atributo o [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) exibam informações de cabeçalho e informações de metadados.Note that attribute does not block the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) from viewing header information and meta-information. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como aplicar o de atributo a um assembly.The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.SuppressIldasmAttribute/vb/sample.vb#1)]
